script: # allow client access to the repository echo "<directorymatch \"^%{localroot}/\"> SSLRequireSSL Order Deny,Allow Deny from all Allow from 127.0.0.1 ::1 %{ssh-host} </directorymatch>" > /etc/httpd/conf.d/%{id}-%{module}.conf if [ -f /usr/bin/systemctl ]; then systemctl reload httpd else service httpd restart >/dev/null fi
